note.p: Domestic gardener in 1871. Bailiff in 1881. Peat merchant in Bournemouth, Hampshire, in 1891.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/1180/70), 1881 (RG11/1198/70), 1891 (RG12/901/64)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 26 September 2013).
